META_DESCRIPTION: Brewly – keep all your coffee cupping notes in one place, share with your team, and discover new flavors.
OG_DESCRIPTION: Keep all your coffee cupping notes in one place, share with your team.
LEAD_TEXT: Store all your coffee cupping notes in one place, share insights with your team, and never lose track of what you brewed and loved.
FAQ_QUESTION_1: How do I reset my password?
FAQ_ANSWER_1: For now we don’t offer this functionality, so please contact us via email.
FAQ_QUESTION_2: Can I import my previous cuppings?
FAQ_ANSWER_2: All info is stored on our server—just log in and you’ll see all your data.
FAQ_QUESTION_3: Can I export all my cuppings to CSV?
FAQ_ANSWER_3: We’ll add export support soon. If you’d like early access or have feedback, let us know!
